phrases: I just realised it for the first time
That I had fallen in love
Twenty-four hours a day thinking of you, you and nothing more than you!
It is something I was not consciously aware of
Somehow ( somehow) I am feeling different from the usual
With you ( the two of us) and our dull chatter
Do not tell me ( mutual love?)
Nope, it is a one-sided crush
Why is my heart pounding like this?
Did a short circuit just make a mess out of my mind?
This is my first time... feeling like this...
I wonder if I have a fever
Suddenly and precipitately, love has arrived.
Instantly igniting my face into a bright red
Is this really what they call love?
I want to know your feelings.
I feel I could fly towards the sky
Woke up in the morning, brushed my teeth
In the blink of an eye, it is 10pm
Today, we laughed a whole lot
At times, with my friends, acting like fools, being noisy
I would not call this my first love
Say, will we be able to meet again tomorrow?
I see you sparkling all over the place
Today was fun, too, was not it?
It is my pleasure to meet you, my new-found love.
Surely, we will meet again tomorrow
We will meet immediately in our dreams
Tanaka-kun, the only thing you have said so far is that it is hot.
It is already hot enough, so if you say it more, it is going to feel hotter.
I ban you from saying, It is hot.
But it really sure is summery!
I have no choice but to punch him.
It really is much too summery!
Everything looks so very bright today!
The air, the people and even this classroom.
I am going to show it off to Mio-chan.
I guess I can just copy it.
You are all worked up this morning.
I did my homework, but I lost it!
You are talking about the Languages Worksheet, right?
Maybe it is stuck between something.
I already tried looking for it just now.
What do you mean, Daihuku Fair!?
What do you mean, a fair...?
Maybe there are extra copies of the worksheet in the teacher's desk.
You are going back to get it?
You are not going to make it back in time!
Hey, class is about to start.
Do not be hasty, and things will turn.
I had to stand outside again...
Why am I always forgetting my homework?
And I actually did my homework this time.
God is just playing with me.
What am I supposed to do with this?
What am I supposed to do?
There are some new products out,
so I was just wondering what I should get!
Why should I listen to what you have to say!?
- not very good, so you should have chosen the one next to it.
I did not buy this because you recommended it!
I heard there were going to be stands set up in our neighbourhood,
so I decided to check them out.
My main objective is the shooting stand.
I have only seen it on TV, so I am excited for today!
That being said, I only have 500 yen today.
I wonder if this is enough.
I wanted to eat yakisoba, but I came here for this today!
There are only caramels and eggplants.
What do you mean by that?
We only carry high-quality and branded products!
I need to bring something home.
Young lady, you cannot just hit something high-tier right off the bat!
It is not going to fall that easily!
You are going to have to hit something easier first.
The only other option I have to hit is the caramels.
The caramels must be completely stuck.
You were only a few more millimetres away from knocking it over!
Young lady, you are pretty good at this.
Are you possibly some undercover gun professional?
This eggplant is not even budging!
Hey, what is with the sad face?
I bet you think I am ripping you off.
Although this stand looks pretty shabby,
I guarantee that we are happy and fair!
No matter how you look at this, there is something wrong!
I can definitely see a nail there!
Hey, why are you being unresponsive!?
More importantly, these things should not be allowed!
You were so happy a few moments back!
I bet you are doing something with the caramels, too!
What am I supposed to hit with my last one?
It is been a while since I have gone to an amusement park.
You have got to go sometime.
I want to buy some juice, so could you give me my wallet?
I am holding onto it for you.
I felt like I would lose it if I kept it.
I am sure it was in here.
It seems like I dropped your wallet.
Let us check the lost and found!
Um, I am looking for a brown wallet that has a snake skin inside.
I really was not sure what I was going to do for a bit there!
Attention: a child with denim shorts,
a denim shirt and a denim hat is looking for her mother.
If this is your child, please come to the information centre.
I am really bad with haunted houses!
That is three lattes to go, correct?
Um, I would also like one of these, one of these and one of these.
Um, I am sorry, but could you say the name?
Oh, I see, I am sorry.
No, I did not mean your family name...
I have always been told that both of my names sound like family names.
No, by name I meant the product name.
What do you mean by product name?
All that is left is to wait to order dessert.
Then I will do it, too.
I am Nano for the whole day today,
so you would better not call me Professor.
Ah, Nano, you just said Professor!
But you already took off the key.
I am just taking a bit of a break right now.
But I am Nano for today.
Oh, Professor - I mean Nano-chan, would you like to play together?
We will play swap, where you become me and I become you.
Then, Professor - I mean Nano-chan, please put on the key.
And I am the Professor, so take off my key.
Hey, hey, what are we going to play?
But right now, I am the Professor.
I became Nano, so Nano became the Professor and ate the snacks!
Then, since I have returned to being Nano, I will go buy food for dinner.
I am not buying any snacks.
Buy chocolate sharks and strawberry juice!
Hey, do not forget about my food.
The Shinonome household was at peace again today.
The next person that says something in English loses.
Ah, Mio-chan, you just said something in English.
You did not say start, so I am safe.
Then I will say a bunch of English before saying start.
Do you know a lot of English?
Carbonation is tickly, so it makes me feel awake.
Oh, Sleeping Beauty woke up without a kiss.
I put a spell on these bubbles to make it taste good.
